summary: Implements a compatibility layer that translates OpenAI‑style chat requests and responses into the format required by the Anthropic API, handling parameter mapping, tool definitions, header processing, caching directives, stop sequences, and usage extraction.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of Anthropic chat models within the Litellm framework by providing an OpenAI‑compatible interface that abstracts away Anthropic‑specific request/response details.
